import React, { useState } from "react"; const Survey = () => { const [postData, setPostData] = useState({ surname: "", firstNames: "", contactNumber: "", date: "", age: 0 }); handleSubmit = event => {}; handleInput = event => { // Changing state event.preventDefault(); this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); }; return (

{surname}

Take our Survey

Personal Details:

setPostData({ ...postData, surname: e.target.value }) } />

setPostData({ ...postData, firstNames: e.target.value }) } />

setPostData({ ...postData, contactNumber: e.target.value }) } />

setPostData({ ...postData, date: e.target.value })} />

setPostData({ ...postData, age: e.target.value })} />

What is your favourite food? (You can choose more than 1 answer)

Pizza

Pasta

Pap and Wors

Chicken stir fry

Beef stir fry

Other



On a scale of 1 to 5 indicate whether you strongly agree to strongly disagree



{" "}

(1) 		Agree

(2) 		Neutral

(3) 		Disagree

(4) 		Strongly disagree

(5)
I like to eat out
I like to watch movies
I like to watch TV
I like to listen to the radio


); }; export default Survey;
